db:abstract.db:para: Contains parameters that describe a mouse wheel event.
This type was introduced in Qt 5.5.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: Mouse wheel events occur when the mouse wheel is rotated.

db:section.db:title: accepted : bool
db:section.db:para: Specifies if the mouse wheel event has been accepted

db:section.db:title: [read-only] angleDelta : Point
db:section.db:para: Specifies The change wheel angle of the mouse wheel event

db:section.db:title: [read-only] buttons : int
db:section.db:para: Specifies the button if present in the mouse wheel event

db:section.db:title: [read-only] modifiers : Modifiers
db:section.db:para: Specifies if any modifiers were applied to the mouse wheel event

db:section.db:title: [read-only] x : int
db:section.db:para: Specifies The X coordinate of the mouse wheel event

db:section.db:title: [read-only] y : int
db:section.db:para: Specifies The Y coordinate of the mouse wheel event
